io.spine.server.delivery

Interface Shardable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AggregatePartRepository, AggregateRepository, ProcessManagerRepository, ProjectionRepository

    public interface Shardable
    A contract for all message destinations, which require the messages sent to them to be grouped and processed in shards.

    Typically, the message destinations are repositories of entities, which dispatch the messages, such as Commands and Events, to the entities.

    In order to avoid concurrent modifications of the same entity in several processing nodes, the entities are virtually grouped into shards by their identifiers. The items which belong to the same shard, should be processed in a synchronous manner (e.g. a single thread) to avoid such an issue.

    Each Shardable may be serving as a destination for different kinds of messages. A particular way to react to a message is defined via consumers, each consuming the messages of a particular kind. I.e. AggregateRepository entities handle Commands and may react to Events and Rejections. Therefore the repository should define three consumers, one for each kind of messages.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      io.spine.core.BoundedContextName getBoundedContextName()
      Obtains the name of the bounded context, in scope of which the current Shardable operates.
      java.lang.Iterable<ShardedStreamConsumer<?,?>> getMessageConsumers()
      Obtains all the message consumers for this Shardable.
      EntityClass getShardedModelClass()
      Obtains the class of Entity which is served by this shardable.
      ShardingStrategy getShardingStrategy()
      Defines the strategy of the sharding.
      default void registerWithSharding()
      Registers this instance with Sharding obtained from the ServerEnvironment.
      default void unregisterWithSharding()
      Unregisters this instance Sharding obtained from the ServerEnvironment.

    • Method Detail

      • getShardingStrategy

        ShardingStrategy getShardingStrategy()
        Defines the strategy of the sharding.

        In particular, sets the rules on which message destination belongs to which shard.

        Returns:
        the strategy of sharding for this Shardable

      • getMessageConsumers

        java.lang.Iterable<ShardedStreamConsumer<?,?>> getMessageConsumers()
        Obtains all the message consumers for this Shardable.
        Returns:
        all the consumers

      • getBoundedContextName

        io.spine.core.BoundedContextName getBoundedContextName()
        Obtains the name of the bounded context, in scope of which the current Shardable operates.
        Returns:
        the name of the bounded context

      • getShardedModelClass

        EntityClass getShardedModelClass()
        Obtains the class of Entity which is served by this shardable.
        Returns:
        the class of the Entity, which processing is being sharded in this Shardable

      • registerWithSharding

        default void registerWithSharding()
        Registers this instance with Sharding obtained from the ServerEnvironment.

      • unregisterWithSharding

        default void unregisterWithSharding()
        Unregisters this instance Sharding obtained from the ServerEnvironment.
